I'm Patrick Rogan, a Raleigh-based digital designer with a focus on creating solutions by rethinking the way we interact with and experience brands and technology. This is a compendium of projects & thoughts revolving around technology, design, and the human condition.

I'm currently available for freelance projects. If you'd like to discuss a role at your company, I'd love to hear about it.
